issue.title: [Website] Publish JS API Docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2201](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2201). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-951 isn't yet resolved because the generated API docs don't reflect the full project hierarchy, but we can still publish the current docs as they stand.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2201?focusedCommentId=16374190) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by PR https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1647
